biotools.summary: BZScan is a free java tool for automatic quantification of DNA microarrays with radioactive labeling. BZScan provides saturation, overshining, and background noise correction, it also gives quality control measures.

bioschemas.name: BZScan
bioschemas.summary: BZScan is a free java tool for automatic quantification of DNA microarrays with radioactive labeling. BZScan provides saturation, overshining, and background noise correction, it also gives quality control measures.
